mapper.select: SELECT SERS_NUM , MENU_ID , HRNK_MENU_ID , MENU_STEP , MENU_NM , WDGT_MENU_NM , SORT_SQNC , MENU_DVSN , MENU_YN , USE_YN , RGSR_NUM , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS REG_DT , UPSR_NUM , DATE_FORMAT(UPDT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS UPDT_DT FROM TBL_MENU_M WHERE 1=1 AND HRNK_MENU_ID = #{menuId} ORDER BY MENU_DVSN, SORT_SQNC
